Text: O̩jo̩-mi. O̩jo̩-mi, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tʼumi no̩ tinyo̩-i?
O O̩jo̩-mi, nadʼudo̩ o̩ro̩ka, e̩ la dohi ñw mi n;
Uwe̩ muda afo̩,
Amata-wa ke̩do̩nʼe̩;
Ma kwadʼuwe̩ oñ ma fʼo̩ o̩wo̩ tane̩,
Omi muda chʼideneku, u chʼone̩ n;
Abo du ku ma li mi adokanyi rʼumi oji,
mʼu li no Jihofa, kʼi aje̩ ñw u fʼuma o̩wo̩;
Uwe̩ muda chʼe̩ne̩ ki mʼumi du kwʼefu iye-mi;
Ma mʼumi du rikpolo nʼuwe̩ kwef uwile̩,
E̩ ki jiji rʼumi n,
Amo̩ko̩ okuno̩ wewe lʼumi daka-i,
ma fʼalu-ma chi ago mi,
Ma dʼumi da rinyo̩ dab omiofo,
ukpahiu-mi gbe̩ dab anade;
Todu amabia donyʼumi daka-i,
u neke kaluka achiku-mi okoke—
ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-mi kpe̩ ñw o̩la-ma,
E̩ ki la iiji rʼumi n, O Jihofa!
Mʼonugo-mi gba bʼo̩kwo̩chageli te̩,
Jadu mi kwef alu idu,
Alu kʼodu-we̩ de̩ nacholi jane̩ ñw amo̩maye-mi;
Ame̩ ku me̩ railo Jihofa, me̩ naje̩-nyu ñw u!
Todu i che̩de̩te̩ o̩bata e̩no̩bata n
Ef ujeju lile le̩ uñwulo̩-mi akwʼugbo-we̩ wa;
Ame̩ne̩chikimi aje̩ e̩wñ efu-ma la ako̩;
Ukpoji ukpoji ane̩ ile̩ du arewa
Todu o̩da onu chʼe-Jihofa,
Ame̩nura ile̩-i du aje̩ e̩wñ mala adojikane̩;
Ugbe̩ʼka arʼo̩,
ama le̩ awa dʼo̩kpakpa-wñ kpogo
